statistics_command_commands_desc: Shows command statistics for this server.
statistics_command_messages_desc: Shows message statistics for this server.
stats_autopost_enable: Enable daily guild channel stats posting
statistics_command_channels_desc: Show channel statistics for the past 30 days
statistics_command_smooth_desc: Shows a smooth (gaussian) message statistics for this server.
statistics_command_users_desc: Show a top 5 guild member chart.
statistics_command_words_desc: Show a Wordcloud of words used across every chat in this server, optionally limited to current day.
statistics_command_words_error_not_enoug: There is not enough information yet, please wait.
statistics_command_analyze_chat_desc: Use AI to analyze chat messages during today or any other specified date (optional)
statistics_not_enough_information_for_th: There is not enough information for this date.
statistics_command_daily_desc: Show general guild statistics for today or any other specified date (optional)
statistics_date_validation_invalid: The date you entered is invalid.
statistics_date_validation_guild_did_not: This guild did not exist at the date you provided.
statistics_date_validation_this_is_from_: This date is from the future :)
statistics_command_daily_event_add_desc: Add an event. Events are displayed in the daily chart
statistics_command_daily_event_add_error: The text you entered for the event is too long (60 chars max)
statistics_command_daily_event_list_desc: Show a list of events for this guild
statistics_command_daily_event_no_events: There are no events in this guild.
statistics_command_daily_event_remove_ch: Choose an event to remove (you can do this multiple times):
